rows.label: qev031302_MSG0001
rows.name: What is this "strategy"? Do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_SEL0011
rows.name: Break down the concept of strategy.

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0002
rows.name:
That makes no sense. War is facing enemy before you.
Can strategy kill enemy for you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0003
rows.name:
Sajif studies strategy all night long these days.
Now I know it is because he is fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0004
rows.name:
Bah. Then you and I prove strategy is not needed.
Only trained body and loaded gun are needed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0005
rows.name:
Sajif reads all night these days.
Fool wastes his time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0006
rows.name:
Do you dislike Sajif's fussy tricks?
Then go defeat everyone at Lotus Keep building site![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0007
rows.name: You cannot wish to be part of cowardly assassination.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0008
rows.name:
Stay quiet, Vio! I hired [ST:playername ].
Not you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0009
rows.name:
I say nothing wrong. Just killing leader will not
claim fortress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0010
rows.name:
Are you so sure? Then be silent and watch.
Prepare for surprise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0011
rows.name: So this is "strategy." It is power unknown to Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0012
rows.name: But I will not accept trickery as strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0013
rows.name:
You took down lots of them, Earth alien!
I watched from distance. Made me laugh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031302_MSG0014
rows.name:
Gya ha ha ha! It was fine battle!
Sajif should learn from your bloodlust.[ST:wait ]
